headline: Is There Now an Opportunity in United Rentals After Infrastructure Spending Surge?
summary: Ever wondered if United Rentals could be the smart buy your watchlist needs? You are not alone in wanting to dig deeper into its value proposition. Recently, United Rentals has seen its share price move up 1.9% over the past week, but it is still down 6.4% over the last month. This adds some intrigue to its 18.2% year-to-date climb. Market watchers are reacting to news of new infrastructure initiatives and increased federal spending on construction, both of which highlight United Rentals’...
